Class javachart.chart.BarChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.BarChart
public class BarChart
extends Chart
A chart that represents data values in columns.

BarChart()
constructs a default chart
BarChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
BarChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class

drawGraph()
draw the complete Bar chart
drawGraph(Graphics)
draw the complete Bar Chart on the specified Graphics class
getBar()
returns the Bar class used in this chart
getXAxis()
returns the X axis used in this chart
getYAxis()
returns the Y axis used in this chart
setBar(Bar)
sets the Bar class to be used by this chart
setXAxis(LabelAxis)
sets an X axis to be used by this chart.
setYAxis(Axis)
sets a Y axis to be used by this chart.

constructs a default chart

constructs a default chart with the specified name

s - chart name
BarChart

                  Graphics g)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class
Parameters:
s - chart name
g - Graphics class to use
